Swapy.gg is dedicated to ensuring a secu: Swapy.gg is dedicated to ensuring a secure and satisfying buying experience for all users. Our Buyer Protection policy offers peace of mind by guaranteeing that sellers fulfill orders precisely as described.
Swapy.gg's Buyer Protection safeguards y: Swapy.gg's Buyer Protection safeguards you in the event of:
The product or service received signific: The product or service received significantly deviates from its description on the listing.
2. Situations Not Covered By Buyer Prote: 2. Situations Not Covered By Buyer Protection:
Buyer Protection does not extend to the: Buyer Protection does not extend to the following circumstances:
When the buyer has explicitly confirmed: When the buyer has explicitly confirmed receipt of the order.
Buyer's remorse or a change of mind afte: Buyer's remorse or a change of mind after an order has been placed.
Transactions initiated or conducted outs: Transactions initiated or conducted outside the Swapy.gg platform.
Any alterations to an account or its con: Any alterations to an account or its contents by the game publisher/developer after a transaction is finalized.
Swapy.gg's Buyer Protection is strictly: Swapy.gg's Buyer Protection is strictly designed to prevent fraudulent claims. For instance, if a seller successfully transferred items but the buyer falsely claims non-receipt, such actions constitute fraud. Any buyer found engaging in fraudulent claims will face immediate account suspension. Swapy.gg reserves the right to pursue legal action against individuals making fraudulent claims.
It is essential for the buyer to confirm: Il est essentiel que l'acheteur confirme la réception uniquement après avoir soigneusement vérifié que les articles ou services reçus sont pleinement fonctionnels et correspondent exactement à la description du produit. Le statut « Réception confirmée » signifie que la transaction est terminée, indiquant que l'acheteur est satisfait de son achat et autorise le versement du paiement au vendeur.
If a buyer does not raise a claim or com: Si un acheteur ne formule aucune réclamation dans les 72 heures suivant l'expédition ou la livraison des marchandises par le vendeur, l'acheteur sera considéré comme ayant accepté l'article ou le service acheté. Aucun remboursement ne sera effectué pour les commandes dont le statut de réception et de finalisation a été confirmé.
In the event of a transaction dispute, t: En cas de litige relatif à une transaction, l'acheteur est tenu de répondre rapidement à nos demandes et de fournir toutes les preuves pertinentes (captures d'écran du jeu, justificatifs officiels, etc.). L'absence de réponse dans les délais impartis vaudra acceptation de la part de l'acheteur et Swapy.gg clôturera le litige.
Our Buyer Protection policy does not cov: Our Buyer Protection policy does not cover payment disputes or chargebacks initiated directly with payment providers. Should such an event occur, our internal investigation will cease, and no refund requests related to that transaction will be considered by Swapy.gg.
Digital Commerce priorities your securit: Digital Commerce priorities your security. Our escrow system safeguards your payment until you confirm delivery, and our Buyer Protection Policy ensures fair resolution in case of any issues. Buy with absolute confidence!
How to Buy on Digital Commerce!: How to Buy on Digital Commerce!
Welcome to Digital Commerce! Our platfor: Welcome to Digital Commerce! Our platform is designed to make buying digital products easy, fast, and secure. Follow these simple steps to find and purchase your desired items with confidence.
Begin by browsing our extensive categori: Begin by browsing our extensive categories or use the search bar to find the specific digital product you're looking for. You can filter results by game, region, price, and delivery time to pinpoint the perfect item.
Click on a product to view its full desc: Click on a product to view its full description, delivery time, and requirements. Pay attention to the seller's rating and reviews to ensure you're buying from a reputable source. If you have questions, use the 'Message Seller' option (if available).
Once you've found the right product, cli: Once you've found the right product, click 'Buy Now.' You'll be directed to the checkout page where you can review your order summary and add any optional notes for the seller.
